text: جَنَّٰتِ عَدۡنٍ ٱلَّتِي وَعَدَ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنُ عِبَادَهُۥ بِٱلۡغَيۡبِۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ وَعۡدُهُۥ مَأۡتِيّٗا
translation: 61. Is Qadni deqsitta jannootay Racmaan kinni Rabbi isi naqoosay tet ablekal tet nummasse kah xagnise kinni, diggah usuk kay xaganay (jannatah keenih hee xagana kinnuk) isi naqoosa kah xagnise yamaatuwaam raqmali.
